message: White everywhere. Walls, ceiling, and floor, polished to a mirror-finish.
We're inside Oval Tower...

name: 警備Ａ
message: "What the?! Intruders!"

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Hey! Stop right there!"
A group of rifle-toting guards appears from down the hall.

name: ミンク
message: "Don't fall off."
With a roar, Mink's bike takes off like a rocket.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Woah!"
Mink slams into the guards blocking our way, then takes off down the hall, wheels screeching against the floor.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Get back here!"

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Stop!"
I hear gunfire behind us. I brace for impact, but Mink rocks the bike to evade them.
We sweep around corners, making our way deeper into the tower.
We lose the guards trying to chase us and head toward a set of stairs at the end of the hall.
Wait, stairs?! We're driving up stairs?!
Mink's driving is insane! The bike takes the stairs at an incredible speed. The sounds of squealing brakes and spinning axles merge with gunfire and shouting.
I wrap my arms tightly around Mink's waist so I won't fall off.
The vibrations are relentless as the bike runs up the stairs, but finally we reach the next hallway.
Phew...
Relieved, I let my body relax a bit.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What floor are we on?"

name: ミンク
message: "The top floor."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Which means..."
Toue's here?
Mink stops the bike at the end of the hallway, in front of a huge set of double doors.
Without wasting a second, he jumps off. I follow suit.
